sentence: The weather is a bit cold today, so wear your coat.
今天天气有点冷，所以穿上你的外套。
There is a beautiful picture on the wall above the desk.
书桌上方的墙上挂着一幅漂亮的画。
Can you write down your home address on this paper, please?
请在这张纸上写下你的家庭住址好吗？
We usually have a short break after the second English lesson.
通常在第二节英语课后我们会有一次短暂休息。
I often go to the library to read books in the afternoon.
我经常下午去图书馆读书。
What is the age of that tall boy? He is thirteen years old.
那个高个子男孩多大了？他十三岁。
All the students in our class like playing football after school.
我们班所有的学生都喜欢放学后踢足球。
- Let's go to the park this Sunday. - All right, that sounds great!
—这周日我们去公园吧。—好吧，听起来太棒了！
He is very hardworking and always finishes his homework on time.
他非常努力，总是按时完成作业。
America is a very big country located far across the ocean.
美国是一个位于大洋彼岸的非常大的国家。
The panda is my favourite animal because it is very cute.
大熊猫是我最喜欢的动物，因为它非常可爱。
Please raise your hand if you know the answer to the question.
如果你知道那个问题的答案，请举手。
Do you have any English storybooks in your new schoolbag?
你的新书包里有英语故事书吗？
Is there anything else I can help you with for the party?
关于派对，还有什么我可以帮你的吗？
I have an apple and a glass of warm milk for breakfast.
我早餐吃一个苹果并喝一杯温牛奶。
April is the fourth month and the flowers begin to bloom.
四月是第四个月，花儿开始绽放。
He hurt his left arm while he was playing basketball yesterday.
昨天打篮球时他伤到了左胳膊。
Let's sit around the table and enjoy our delicious dinner.
让我们围坐在桌旁享受我们的美味晚餐。
I usually arrive at the school gate at half past seven.
我通常在七点半到达校门口。
We learn many interesting lessons and make friends at school.
我们在学校学习许多有趣的课程并交朋友。
My family often goes to the park or cinema at the weekend.
我的家人在周末经常去公园或电影院。
August is the eighth month and the weather is usually very hot.
八月是第八个月，天气通常非常热。
Autumn is a beautiful season with golden leaves on the trees.
秋天是一个美丽的季节，树上有金色的叶子。
He came back home late because of the heavy traffic jam.
因为交通拥堵，他很晚才回到家。
Eating too much candy is bad for your teeth and health.
吃太多糖对你的牙齿和健康有害。
The monkey is eating a yellow banana on the tall tree.
猴子正在高树上吃一根黄香蕉。
I want to be a famous singer and perform all over the world.
我想成为一名著名的歌手并在全世界演出。
Where are you from? I am from a small city in China.
你来自哪里？我来自中国的一个小城市。
She is very good at playing the piano and likes music a lot.
她非常擅长弹钢琴，并且非常喜欢音乐。
There are many beautiful flowers in our school garden now.
现在我们学校的花园里有许多美丽的花。
I was late for school because I missed the first bus today.
我上学迟到了，因为今天我没赶上第一班公交。
My father likes eating beef noodles for lunch on weekends.
我爸爸喜欢在周末午餐时吃牛肉面。
There is a small desk behind the door in my room.
我房间的门后有一张小书桌。
He is my best friend and we often do our homework together.
他是我最好的朋友，我们经常一起做作业。
The elephant is a very big animal with a long nose.
大象是有着长鼻子的非常大的动物。
I often go to school by bike to enjoy the fresh air.
我经常骑自行车上学以享受新鲜空气。
Look! A beautiful bird is singing on the tree outside.
看！一只美丽的鸟正在外面的树上唱歌。
My birthday is in June and I will have a big party then.
我的生日在六月，到时我会办一个大派对。
He is wearing a black T-shirt and a pair of blue trousers.
他穿着一件黑色的T恤和一条蓝色的裤子。
The teacher wrote the news on the blackboard for us to read.
老师在黑板上写下了这条新闻供我们阅读。
The sky is very blue and clear on a sunny and bright day.
在晴朗明媚的日子里，天空非常蓝且清澈。
Doing more exercise is very good for your body and health.
多做运动对你的身体和健康非常有益。
I like reading books about space and wild animals.
我喜欢读关于太空和野生动物的书。
Please put your old toys into this small wooden box.
请把你的旧玩具放进这个小木箱里。
The tall boy standing near the library is my cousin, Tom.
站在图书馆附近的那个高个子男孩是我的表弟汤姆。
I usually have some bread and an egg for my breakfast.
我早餐通常吃一些面包和一个鸡蛋。
The stars are very bright in the dark and clear night sky.
在黑暗晴朗的夜空中，星星非常明亮。
My older brother is a student at a local college now.
我哥哥现在是当地学院的一名学生。
There are many tall and modern buildings in the big city.
大城市里有许多高大现代的建筑物。
We will take a bus to the museum next Saturday morning.
下周六早晨我们将坐公交车去博物馆。
My father is very busy with his work, but he still plays with me.
我父亲工作很忙，但他仍然陪我玩。
I like playing football, but I am not very good at it.
我喜欢踢足球，但我不是很擅长。
My mother bought a new and beautiful dress for me yesterday.
我妈妈昨天为我买了一件漂亮的新裙子。
We had a large and delicious cake for my birthday party.
我生日聚会时，我们吃了一个又大又好吃的蛋糕。
Can you call me when you reach the airport, please?
你到达机场时能给我打个电话吗？
I can speak English well after a year of practice.
练习一年后，我能说好英语了。
Children like eating sweet candy, but it is bad for teeth.
孩子喜欢吃甜糖果，但这对牙齿不好。
Beijing is the capital of China and a very big city.
北京是中国的首都，也是一个非常大的城市。
My father drives a white car to work every day.
我父亲每天开一辆白色的车去上班。
Rabbits like to eat fresh carrots and live in the garden.
兔子喜欢吃新鲜胡萝卜，生活在花园里。
My grandmother has a small white cat with long fur.
我祖母有一只留着长毛的小白猫。
Please take a chair and wait for the teacher to come.
请搬把椅子坐下，等候老师过来。
We had some chicken and vegetables for dinner yesterday.
昨天我们晚饭吃了一些鸡肉和蔬菜。
China is a great country with a long and interesting history.
中国是一个拥有悠久有趣历史的伟大国家。
Chinese people are very friendly and like to drink tea.
中国人非常友好，而且喜欢喝茶。
I like eating chocolate, but I shouldn't eat too much.
我喜欢吃巧克力，但我不该吃太多。
You can choose your favourite book from the library shelf.
你可以从图书馆书架上选择你最喜欢的书。
People decorate their houses with many lights on Christmas.
圣诞节时，人们用许多灯装饰他们的房子。
Let's go to the cinema to watch an exciting movie tonight.
让我们今晚去电影院看场精彩的电影吧。
I live in a peaceful city with many trees and parks.
我住在一个有着许多树木和公园的宁静城市。
There are fifty students in our class from different towns.
我们班有五十名来自不同城镇的学生。
I often play football with my classmates after school.
我经常在放学后和同学们一起踢足球。
You should keep your room clean and tidy every day.
你应该每天保持房间干净整洁。
Put on your warm clothes because it's cold outside.
穿上你暖和的衣服，因为外面很冷。
My father likes to drink a cup of coffee every morning.
我父亲喜欢每天早晨喝一杯咖啡。
Don't drink too much cola; it is not good for your health.
别喝太多可乐；这对你的健康不好。
The weather becomes very cold in winter, especially at night.
冬天天气变得非常冷，尤其是晚上。
What is your favourite colour? Mine is sky blue.
你最喜欢的颜色是什么？我最喜欢的是天蓝色。
Please come to my house to celebrate my birthday this Sunday.
请本周日来我家庆祝我的生日。
Don't spend too much time playing computer games on weekends.
周末不要花太多时间玩电脑游戏。
I use the computer to look up information for my science project.
我用电脑为我的科学项目查找信息。
My mother cooks delicious and healthy food for us every day.
我妈妈每天为我们做美味健康的食物。
The weather is becoming cool and pleasant in the early autumn.
初秋天气正变得凉爽宜人。
My cousin will visit us during the next summer holiday.
我表弟将在下个暑假来看望我们。
My dad is a doctor and he works very hard in the hospital.
我爸爸是一名医生，他在医院工作非常努力。
The little girls are learning how to dance in the music club.
小女孩们正在音乐俱乐部学习跳舞。
Wild animals are in danger because their natural homes are lost.
野生动物由于天然家园的丧失正处于危险之中。
What is the date today? It is Friday, October twelfth.
今天几号？今天是十月十二日，星期五。
She is the only daughter in her family and is very clever.
她是家里唯一的女儿，非常聪明。
There are twenty-four hours in a day and seven days in a week.
一天有二十四小时，一周有七天。
Dear friends, I hope you all have a wonderful holiday.
亲爱的朋友们，我希望你们都有一个美妙的假期。
December is the last month of the year and it is often snowy.
十二月是一年中的最后一月，而且经常下雪。
Please put your English textbook on the desk and listen to me.
请把你的英语课本放在桌子上听我说。
You should use a dictionary to look up new English words.
你应该用词典来查找英语生词。
We learn many different subjects like maths and music at school.
我们在学校学习数学和音乐等许多不同的科目。
I usually have dinner with my parents at seven every night.
我通常每晚七点和父母一起吃晚饭。
What do you usually do on Saturday afternoons? I play football.
你周六下午通常做什么？我踢足球。
My neighbor has a small brown dog that likes running around.
我邻居有一只喜欢到处乱跑的小棕狗。
Please close the door quietly when you leave the classroom.
离开教室时请轻轻关门。
The little boy likes to draw pictures of animals in his notebook.
那个小男孩喜欢在笔记本上画动物。
We should drink plenty of fresh water to stay healthy.
我们应该喝充足的新鲜水以保持健康。
The bus driver is very friendly and always says hello to us.
公交司机非常友好，总是向我们打招呼。
There are some white ducks swimming in the small pond now.
现在有一些白鸭正在小池塘里游泳。
We visited many museums during our last summer holiday in Beijing.
上次在北京过暑假期间我们参观了许多博物馆。
Each student in our class has a new school uniform.
我们班每个学生都有一套新校服。
He usually gets up early to go for a run in the park.
他通常起得很早去公园跑步。
Pandas like to eat fresh bamboo and live in the forest.
熊猫喜欢吃新鲜竹子且生活在森林里。
I have a boiled egg and some bread for breakfast every morning.
我每天早晨早餐吃一个煮蛋和一些面包。
There are eighty students in the music club this year.
今年音乐俱乐部有八十名学生。
The elephant is the largest animal living on the land.
象是陆地上生活的最大的动物。
I sent an email to my friend in England yesterday afternoon.
昨天下午我给我在英国的朋友发了一封电子邮件。
English is a very important language used all over the world.
英语是一门风靡全世界的重要语言。
I hope you will enjoy your stay in our beautiful city.
希望你在我们这座美丽的城市度过愉快的时光。
Every morning, he reads English for half an hour.
每天早晨，他读半小时英语。
Everybody in our class is ready for the school sports meet.
我们班的每个人都为校运会做好了准备。
Dogs have big eyes and a good sense of smell.
狗有大眼睛和良好的嗅觉。
There is a big car factory in the central part of our city.
我们城市中心区域有一家大型汽车厂。
Our family usually goes to the park or library on weekends.
我们全家人通常在周末去公园或图书馆。
The farmer lives on a large farm with a lot of animals.
农场主住在一个有着许多动物的大农场里。
The high-speed train travels very fast to the next big city.
高铁行驶很快，去往下一个大城市。
My father works very hard in a big company every day.
我父亲每天在一家大公司工作得很努力。
Basketball is my favourite sport and I play it after school.
篮球是我最喜欢的运动，我放学后玩它。
February is the shortest month of the year with twenty-eight days.
二月是一年中最短的一个月，有二十八天。
Happiness is a wonderful feeling that we all want to have.
幸福是我们都想拥有的美妙感觉。
Can you help me find my lost keys? I left them somewhere.
你能帮我找找我丢的钥匙吗？我把它们落在某处了。
- How are you today? - I am fine, thank you very much.
—你今天怎么样？—我很好，非常感谢。
You should finish your homework before you go out to play.
出去玩之前你应该完成作业。
First finish your homework, and then you can play games.
先完成作业，然后你可以玩游戏。
There are many colorful fish swimming in the small lake.
小湖里有许多彩色的鱼在游泳。
There are five students in each small group for the project.
项目的每个小组有五名学生。
Please don't throw rubbish on the floor; put it into the bin.
请别把垃圾扔在地上；把它放进垃圾桶里。
The red flower in the garden smells very sweet and nice.
花园里的那朵红花闻起来非常香。
My mother usually cooks healthy and delicious food for us.
我妈妈通常为我们做健康美味的食物。
Football is a popular sport and many boys like playing it.
足球是一项流行的运动，许多男孩喜欢踢。
I bought a special gift for my mother's birthday last week.
上周我为我妈妈的生日买了一份特别的礼物。
There are forty students in our class from different towns.
我们班有四十名来自不同城镇的学生。
There are four seasons in a year, and spring is the first.
一年有四季，春天是第一季。
Friday is my favourite day because the weekend is coming.
周五是我最喜欢的日子，因为周末就要来了。
He is a kind boy and has many friends in the school club.
他是一个善良的男孩，在学校俱乐部有很多朋友。
The people in the small town are very friendly to visitors.
小镇上的人对游客非常友好。
I am from China and I live in a big city near the sea.
我来自中国，住在大海边的一座大城市里。
Eating fresh fruit every day is very good for your health.
每天吃新鲜水果对你的健康很有好处。
The bus was so full that I couldn't find a seat to sit.
公交车太挤了，我找不到座位坐。
Playing with my best friends in the park is a lot of fun.
和最好的朋友们在公园里玩很有趣。
My favorite game is hide-and-seek and we play it in the yard.
我最喜欢的游戏是捉迷藏，我们在院子里玩它。
Our school has a beautiful garden with many tall trees.
我们学校有一个长着许多高树的美丽花园。
Can you help me get some water from the kitchen, please?
请帮我从厨房拿点水来好吗？
I received a beautiful book as a gift for my birthday.
我收到一本精美的书作为生日礼物。
The giraffe is a tall animal with a very long neck.
长颈鹿是一种有着长脖子的高大动物。
The little girl is a clever student in our English class.
那个小女孩是我们英语课上一个聪明的学生。
Please give this letter to your English teacher tomorrow morning.
请明天早晨把这封信交给你的英语老师。
The window is made of glass, so be careful not to break it.
窗户是玻璃做的，所以小心别打碎它。
We usually go to the library to study on Saturday afternoons.
我们通常在周六下午去图书馆学习。
It is a good habit to read English for thirty minutes every day.
每天读三十分钟英语是一个好习惯。
I am in Grade Seven and my sister is in Grade Nine.
我在七年级，我姐姐在九年级。
My grandad likes to take a walk in the park after dinner.
我爷爷喜欢晚饭后去公园散步。
My grandma is very kind and often cooks delicious food for me.
我奶奶人很好，经常给我做好吃的。
My grandfather has a lot of interesting stories about the past.
我祖父有很多关于过去的有趣故事。
I visit my grandmother in the countryside during every holiday.
每个假期我都会去乡下看望我的祖母。
My grandparents live in a small but peaceful village near the sea.
我祖父母住在一个靠近大海的宁静小村庄里。
The grapes in the garden are sweet and juicy in autumn.
秋天花园里的葡萄又甜又多汁。
The children are playing happily on the green grass now.
孩子们现在正在绿草地上开心地玩耍。
We had a great time during our trip to the Great Wall.
在长城之行中我们度过了一段美好的时光。
Green is my favourite colour because it is like nature.
绿色是我最喜欢的颜色，因为它像大自然。
The sky is grey and cloudy, so it might rain later.
天阴沉沉的，所以等下可能会下雨。
There are many yellow leaves on the ground in early autumn.
初秋地上有很多黄叶。
We worked in a group to finish our science project together.
我们小组合作一起完成了科学项目。
Eating breakfast every morning is a very healthy habit.
每天早晨吃早餐是一个非常健康的习惯。
She has long black hair and big blue eyes, very cute.
她留着黑色长发，有着大大的蓝眼睛，非常可爱。
It's half past eight; we have only ten minutes for class.
现在是八点半；我们离上课只有十分钟了。
Please raise your hand if you want to ask a question.
如果你想提问，请举手。
I felt very happy when I received your beautiful gift.
当我收到你精美的礼物时，我感到非常开心。
He worked very hard and passed the difficult math test.
他学习非常努力，通过了那场很难的数学测试。
He often wears a red hat to protect himself from the sun.
他经常戴着一顶红帽子来防晒。
I have a big family and we often go to the park.
我有一个大家庭，我们经常去公园。
The tall boy hit his head against the door just now.
那个高个子男孩刚才头撞在了门上。
Eating more vegetables and fruit is good for a healthy life.
多吃蔬果有利于健康生活。
I can hear someone singing in the room next door.
我可以听到有人在隔壁房间唱歌。
The box is too heavy for the little boy to lift up.
箱子太重了，小男孩搬不起来。
Hello! My name is Tom and I am a new student here.
你好！我叫汤姆，是这里的新学生。
Can you help me with my English homework this evening?
今晚你能帮我做英语作业吗？
Her dream is to become a famous teacher in the future.
她的梦想是将来成为一名著名的老师。
Wait for me here; I will be back in five minutes.
在这里等我；我五分钟后就回来。
Hi! How are you today? I am fine, thank you.
嗨！你今天怎么样？我很好，谢谢。
History is an interesting subject about the people and the past.
历史是关于人民和过去的一门有趣的学科。
What are you going to do during the next winter holiday?
下个寒假你打算做什么？
I usually go home immediately after school to do homework.
我通常放学后立即回家做作业。
I usually finish my homework before I watch TV on Friday.
周五看电视前我通常先完成作业。
The farmer has a white horse on his large farm now.
农场主在他的大农场里有一匹白马。
My mother works as a doctor in a local city hospital.
我妈妈在当地一家城市医院当医生。
It is very hot in summer, so we like going swimming.
夏天很热，所以我们喜欢去游泳。
We stayed in a small hotel near the old and quiet library.
我们住在一家离古老宁静的图书馆不远的小旅馆。
How many students are there in your English class? Fifty.
你们英语班有多少名学生？五十名。
How do you usually get to school every morning? By bus.
你每天早晨通常怎么上学？坐公交车。
There are about three hundred people in the stadium now.
现在体育场里大约有三百人。
I am very hungry; let's have lunch as soon as possible.
我很饿；让我们尽快吃午饭吧。
Hurry up! We are going to be late for the school meeting.
快点！我们学校会议要迟到了。
I like eating sweet ice cream on a hot summer afternoon.
我喜欢在炎热的夏天下午吃甜冰淇淋。
That's a great idea! Let's go to the museum this Sunday.
那是个好主意！这周日我们去博物馆吧。
Learning English is very important for our future work.
学习英语对我们未来的工作非常重要。
Wait for me in front of the school gate at four o'clock.
四点钟在校门口等我。
There are many books in the school library for students.
学校图书馆里有很多给学生读的书。
The story about the magical forest is very interesting.
那个关于魔法森林的故事非常有意思。
The little cat jumped into the box to hide from us.
小猫跳进箱子躲着我们。
My favourite subject is English because I like talking with folks.
我最喜欢的科目是英语，因为我喜欢和人交流。
I found my lost pen; it was under the small wooden table.
我找到了丢的笔；它就在那个小木桌下。
The cat is cleaning its face with its small paws now.

Many workers are building a new library near our school.
许多工人正在我们学校附近建一座新图书馆。
English is an important language used all over the world.
英语是一门在全世界都很受欢迎的重要语言。
He is thirteen years old and lives in a big city in China.
他十三岁，住在中国的一个大城市。
The zebra is a famous animal from Africa with black stripes.
斑马是来自非洲的一种有着黑色条纹的著名动物。
We saw many interesting wild animals in the city zoo yesterday.
昨天我们在城市动物园见到了许多有趣的野生动物。
I have a few English books to read this weekend.
这周末我有几本英语书要读。
There is a little milk in the glass on the table.
桌子上的玻璃杯里有一点牛奶。
I have a lot of friends in my new middle school.
在我的新中学里我有很多朋友。
My uncle is a famous actor and he works in Beijing.
我叔叔是一位著名的演员，他在北京工作。
She likes playing the piano and she also likes singing songs.
她喜欢弹钢琴，也喜欢唱歌。
I usually have an apple and an egg for my breakfast.
我早餐通常吃一个苹果和一个鸡蛋。
Art is an interesting subject and I like drawing very much.
美术是一门有趣的学科，我非常喜欢画画。
He likes playing basketball as well as football after school.
放学后他喜欢打篮球，也喜欢踢足球。
China is a great country located in the east of Asia.
中国是一个位于亚洲东部的伟大国家。
Mother is cooking a delicious dinner in the kitchen at the moment.
妈妈此刻正在厨房里做美味的晚饭。
We often go to the library to study at weekends.
我们经常在周末去图书馆学习。
My father is at work now and he will be back soon.
我父亲现在正在工作，他很快就会回来。
My aunt is a friendly nurse in a big city hospital.
我姨妈是一个大城市医院里一位友好的护士。
Eating too much sweet candy is bad for your teeth.
吃太多甜糖对你的牙齿有害。
Eating more vegetables and fruit is good for your health.
多吃蔬菜和水果对你的健康有好处。
My mother often cooks delicious green bean soup in summer.
我妈妈夏天经常做美味的绿豆汤。
I usually go to bed at nine o'clock every night.
我通常每晚九点上床睡觉。
Our first English lesson will begin at eight o'clock tomorrow.
明天早晨八点开始我们的第一节英语课。
The new library is between the classroom and the playground.
新图书馆在教室和操场之间。
The weather is a bit cold today, so wear your jacket.
今天天气有点冷，所以穿上你的夹克吧。
I can't play the violin, but I can play the piano.
我不会拉小提琴，但我会弹钢琴。
He sent me a beautiful birthday card yesterday morning.
昨天早晨他寄给我一张精美的生日卡。
Hurry up! We need to catch the early bus to school.
快点！我们需要赶早班公交去上学。
I often listen to English songs on this old CD player.
我经常用这个旧CD播放机听英语歌。
The little child is playing with a toy car in the yard.
那个小孩正在院子里玩玩具车。
Put on your warm coat because it is cold outside now.
穿上你暖和的外套，因为现在外面很冷。
Where do these beautiful flowers come from? From the garden.
这些漂亮的花来自哪里？来自花园。
My father works very hard in a big computer company.
我父亲在一家大型电脑公司工作非常努力。
Be careful not to cut your finger with the sharp knife.
小心别用锋利的刀割到手指。
The small panda is very cute and everyone likes it.
那只小熊猫非常可爱，每个人都喜欢它。
The math problem is very difficult for the little boy.
那道数学题对那个小男孩来说非常难。
Please help me print this important document for the meeting.
请帮我为会议打印这份重要的文档。
She is wearing a beautiful red dress for the school party.
她穿着一件漂亮的红裙子去参加学校派对。
London is the capital of England and a very big city.
伦敦是英国的首都，也是一个非常大的城市。
He visited many interesting countries in Europe last summer holiday.
去年暑假期间他参观了欧洲许多有趣的国家。
I usually do my homework in the evening before dinner.
我通常在晚上晚饭前做作业。
The farmer is working hard on his large farm now.
农场主现在正在他的大农场里努力工作。
There are about fifty students in our school music club.
我们学校音乐俱乐部大约有五十名学生。
We went to the cinema to watch an exciting film yesterday.
昨天我们去电影院看了一部精彩的电影。
What is your first name? My first name is Peter.
你叫什么名字？我的名字是彼得。
There is a tall tree in front of our classroom.
我们教室前面有一棵高树。
My parents bought some new furniture for our new house.
我父母为我们的新房子买了一些新家具。
If you eat too much chocolate, you might get fat.
如果你吃太多巧克力，你可能会变胖。
Remember to get off the bus at the next station.
记得在下一站下车。
Every student is getting ready for the school sports meet.
每个学生都在为校运会做准备。
He usually gets up early to go for a run in the park.
他通常起得很早去公园跑步。
I need to go back home to get my English book.
我需要回家去拿我的英语书。
I usually go home immediately after the football match.
足球赛结束后我通常立即回家。
My mother often goes shopping in the supermarket on Sundays.
我妈妈经常在周日去超市购物。
It is a good habit to go to bed early every night.
每天早睡是一个好习惯。
I go to school by bike every morning to exercise.
我每天早晨骑自行车上学以锻炼身体。
The little baby usually goes to sleep at eight o'clock.
那个小宝宝通常在八点钟入睡。
My grandpa likes to sit in the garden and read newspapers.
我爷爷喜欢坐在花园里看报纸。
Ha ha! That is a very funny story you just told us.
哈哈！你刚才讲的那个故事非常有趣。
The school meeting will be held in the big school hall.
学校会议将在学校大礼堂举行。
He has a new schoolbag and two interesting storybooks.
他有一个新书包和两本有趣的故事书。
I usually have breakfast with my parents at seven o'clock.
我通常在七点和父母一起吃早饭。
Our family usually has dinner together at seven every night.
我们全家人通常在每晚七点一起吃晚饭。
I have got a new dictionary and it is very useful.
我得到了一本新字典，它非常有用。
We usually have lunch in the school canteen at twelve.
我们通常十二点在学校食堂吃午饭。
He is a kind boy and he likes helping his classmates.
他是一个善良的男孩，他喜欢帮助同学。
I hope to hear from my pen friend in England soon.
我希望很快能收到英国笔友的信。
I saw him playing football on the playground just now.
我刚才看见他在操场上踢足球。
I like eating hot dogs with a lot of heavy sauce.
我喜欢吃加了很多厚酱汁的热狗。
My family moved to a small but peaceful house last month.
上个月我们全家搬到了一所虽小但很宁静的房子里。
I like reading books. How about you, my dear friend?
我喜欢读书。你呢，我亲爱的朋友？
Hurry up! The first English lesson will begin in five minutes.
快点！第一节英语课五分钟后就开始了。
I'm afraid I can't go to your party this Sunday afternoon.
恐怕这周日下午我不能去参加你的派对。
I use the computer to look up information for my project.
我用电脑为我的项目查找信息。
The Internet is very useful for us to learn new things.
互联网对我们学习新事物非常有用。
IT is an interesting subject about computers and technology.
信息技术是一门关于计算机和技术的有趣的学科。
Please be careful when you use the new computer keyboard.
使用新电脑键盘时请小心。
My mother bought two kilos of fresh apples in the market.
我妈妈在市场里买了两公斤新鲜苹果。
Mother is busy cooking delicious food in the kitchen now.
妈妈现在正忙着在厨房里做美味的食物。
What is your last name? My last name is Green.
你姓什么？我姓格林。
